definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Get a book of positive , inspirational thoughts and keep it by your desk or by your pillow. Read one or two passages each day.
sentences.chinese: 桌上或案头摆放着一本励志书，每天都去朗读一两段。

sentences.english: There is a series of science and technology on the desk.
sentences.chinese: 案头放着一套科技丛书。

sentences.english: On the second day, Wang left the lab and went into his office to do some paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 第二天王离开实验室到办公室做一些案头工作。

sentences.english: His lameness made him fond of sedentary occupation.
sentences.chinese: 他的残废使他喜欢做些案头工作。

sentences.english: It’s a shame that Saya has now returned to her Tokyo university desk job.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，塞娅现在又回到东京大学做案头工作。

sentences.english: I have some paper work to finish.
sentences.chinese: 我有些案头工作要完成。

sentences.english: These electronic funds transfer devices do save us a lot of paperwork and time.
sentences.chinese: 这些电子转帐设备确实省了我们许多时间和案头工作。

sentences.english: Long hours of desk work is a sure way of developing a whole host of back problems.
sentences.chinese: 长时间的案头工作肯定会导致一大堆的背部问题。

sentences.english: Sizes range from small benchtop chambers to full walk-in rooms.
sentences.chinese: 尺寸大小从小型的案头试验室到可以行走进入的房间。

sentences.english: He is sitting at his desk and his way his paperwork .
sentences.chinese: 他正坐在写字台前忙着他的案头工作。

sentences.english: In this fourth lesson, we're going to learn words about working at your desk.
sentences.chinese: 在这第四节课中，我们将学习有关案头工作的词汇。

sentences.english: The paperwork can stay till tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 案头工作可以明天再做。

sentences.english: Desktopresearch, which takes advantage of studies that have been already beendone.
sentences.chinese: 案头研究，利用已经完成的研究结果。

definition: to read through to evaluate/to referee
to bend over one's desk (writing, studying, taking a nap etc)
